page.title: 06A Fire in Sandhills School
page.content: On Friday November 9th 1984 there was a fire in one of the classrooms in Sandhills School.The children in that class were sent home and did not return to school until the following Wednesday When they did return they had their classroom in the hall.Because of the disaster the Christmas concert was cancelled and each class had their own concert in their own class room.Luckily the fire was in a separate classroom so it did not spread and damage other parts of the school.But a fire was attemted in the headmasters office.Here a window was broken,spirit was poured on the desk and they threw in a match.But the match did not light.Three months later the damaged classroom was fully repaired and painted.The children invited each class to see the new classroom with new tables,chairs and eqipment...
